EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=}}: Win 2 Tix to VMworld in San Francisco | Final Drawing Friday
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Named Friday, The Final Winner Shall Be.
Win 2 Tickets to VMworld®: http://bit.ly/1krN3vc
Win 2 Full Passes to VMworld® 2014 <http://bit.ly/1krN3vc> Two Winners Named. One Winner Remains.
This Friday, June 27th, VMTurbo is giving away its final two Full Conference Passes to VMworld® 2014 in San Francisco <http://longwhiteclouds.com/2014/06/13/want-a-free-ticket-to-vmworld-usa-find-out-how/>. Enter to win today <http://bit.ly/1vvjDi7>. Enter to Win <http://bit.ly/1krN3vc> 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
